mapper.sql: ID, MAT_ENG_ID, CERT_TYPE, CERT_NAME, CERT_CODE, APTITUTE_SEQUENCE, PROFESS_TYPE, "APTITUTE_ LEVEL", IS_MAJOR_FUND, APTITUTE_CONTENT, APTITUTE_CODE, APTITUTE_DATE, APTITUTE_WAY, APTITUTE_STATUS, APTITUTE_CHANGE_AT, APTITUTE_CHANGE_REASON, ATTACH_CERT
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_APTITUTE (ID, MAT_ENG_ID, CERT_TYPE, CERT_CODE, APTITUTE_SEQUENCE, PROFESS_TYPE, "APTITUTE_ LEVEL", IS_MAJOR_FUND, APTITUTE_CONTENT, APTITUTE_CODE, APTITUTE_DATE, APTITUTE_WAY, APTITUTE_STATUS, APTITUTE_CHANGE_AT, APTITUTE_CHANGE_REASON, ATTACH_CERT) values (#{id}, #{matEngId}, #{certType}, #{certCode}, #{aptituteSequence}, #{professType}, #{aptituteLevel}, #{isMajorFund}, #{aptituteContent}, #{aptituteCode}, #{aptituteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aptituteWay}, #{aptituteStatus}, #{aptituteChangeAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aptituteChangeReason}, #{attachCert})

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_APTITUTE
ID,
MAT_ENG_ID,
CERT_TYPE,
CERT_NAME,
CERT_CODE,
APTITUTE_SEQUENCE,
PROFESS_TYPE,
"APTITUTE_ LEVEL",
IS_MAJOR_FUND,
APTITUTE_CONTENT,
APTITUTE_CODE,
APTITUTE_DATE,
APTITUTE_WAY,
APTITUTE_STATUS,
APTITUTE_CHANGE_AT,
APTITUTE_CHANGE_REASON,
ATTACH_CERT,
#{id},
#{matEngId},
#{certType},
#{certName},
#{certCode},
#{aptituteSequence},
#{professType},
#{aptituteLevel},
#{isMajorFund},
#{aptituteContent},
#{aptituteCode},
#{aptituteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aptituteWay},
#{aptituteStatus},
#{aptituteChangeAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aptituteChangeReason},
#{attachCert},
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_APTITUTE
MAT_ENG_ID = #{matEngId},
CERT_TYPE = #{certType},
CERT_NAME = #{certName},
CERT_CODE = #{certCode},
APTITUTE_SEQUENCE = #{aptituteSequence},
PROFESS_TYPE = #{professType},
"APTITUTE_ LEVEL" = #{aptituteLevel},
IS_MAJOR_FUND = #{isMajorFund},
APTITUTE_CONTENT = #{aptituteContent},
APTITUTE_CODE = #{aptituteCode},
APTITUTE_DATE = #{aptituteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APTITUTE_WAY = #{aptituteWay},
APTITUTE_STATUS = #{aptituteStatus},
APTITUTE_CHANGE_AT = #{aptituteChangeAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APTITUTE_CHANGE_REASON = #{aptituteChangeReason},
ATTACH_CERT = #{attachCert},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_APTITUTE set MAT_ENG_ID = #{matEngId}, CERT_TYPE = #{certType}, CERT_CODE = #{certCode}, APTITUTE_SEQUENCE = #{aptituteSequence}, PROFESS_TYPE = #{professType}, "APTITUTE_ LEVEL" = #{aptituteLevel}, IS_MAJOR_FUND = #{isMajorFund}, APTITUTE_CONTENT = #{aptituteContent}, APTITUTE_CODE = #{aptituteCode}, APTITUTE_DATE = #{aptituteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APTITUTE_WAY = #{aptituteWay}, APTITUTE_STATUS = #{aptituteStatus}, APTITUTE_CHANGE_AT = #{aptituteChangeAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APTITUTE_CHANGE_REASON = #{aptituteChangeReason}, ATTACH_CERT = #{attachCert} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select t1.*, t3.ID as ID_, t3.NAME as FILE_NAME from T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_APTITUTE t1 left join T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_ENG t2 on t1.MAT_ENG_ID=t2.ID left join T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_ATTACHMENT t3 on t3.BUSINESS_ID = t1.ID where t2.SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId}
